Connect Your Enterprise


Automate Your Process

Free your team to focus on cost, energy, and production efficiency with an automated process producing high quality products.

Interact With Your System

Monitor & maintain your process with a high performance user interface enabling you to quickly respond to process upsets.

Manage Operations

Understand & reduce production costs throughout the supply chain by turning your process data into useful information.

Connect Your Enterprise

Optimize business processes from the shop floor to the top floor by unifying your company into an exceptional team.

Make Your Process Work for You

How do you ensure you you are making consistent, high-quality, products every time one rolls off the line?

One way is using Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs) to automate you process. Automation executes tasks the same way every time, freeing your team to understand and manage quality, resource usage, and costs more effectively.


"Corso Systems made our lives easier and enabled us to do more than we could with other control systems in the past."
— Randy Soule, Jaxon Energy

Intuitive Interaction

Amplify your staff's experience and expertise using high-performance systems to interact with your process.

Human Machine Interfaces (HMI) give your operators full control of your process providing feedback on status, alarms, upsets, etc. HMIs can even transform your data into information using historical trends, dashboard elements, and automatic notifications.


"Corso Systems developed a powerful and easy to user interface for our operators run our plant with access to the information they need when they need it."
— Ron Bell, Jaxon Energy

Manufacturing Intelligence

Make smart decisions about your process by turning data into useful information.

Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES) integrate manufacturing and business operations enabling you to directly correlate things like energy usage, inventory, and quality to real-time process conditions. Using this information allows you to fully understand your processes and how they can be optimized to reach their highest potential.


"The MES system and custom solutions Corso Systems built for our facilities will be paying dividends for years to come."
— Process Engineer, EP Minerals

Connect Your Enterprise

Optimizing outcomes at the plant level is only the first step.

Connecting all of your shop floors to the top floor gives you the ability to reach your full potential. Once connected, every level of your organization will have access to information necessary to make the best decisions possible — for the entire organization.


"We spent time with other companies who couldn't meet our needs. Corso Systems rose to the challenge, connected all of our systems and gave us the foundation for future growth."
— Director of Operations, Irrigation System OEM

Custom Solutions

Your needs are as unique as your products.

While off-the-shelf tools can get you most of the way to your goals, sometimes you need something custom-tailored for you. Whether you need mobile access, a way to integrate process data with your business systems, or anything else you can dream up, we can help turn your vision into reality.


"Corso Systems built an awesome system for us. We were able to grow our team, while getting more done in less time with the new tools."
— Chris Ferrari, Ferrari Public Affairs
